block_comment: This block is used to implement bus delay in a synchronous system. Verilog's non-blocking assignment operator "<=" is used to impose a delay on the "dm_tdqs" signal before assigning it to "dm_in", representing delay transmission through a bus in a synchronous hardware system. The delay time is dictated by a pre-defined constant "BUS_DELAY". This is useful to reproduce the exact system behavior considering signal propagation delays.
